What are the necessary files and links required to change Verus-Desktop from Lite Mode to Native Mode?

The necessary files and links required to change Verus-Desktop from Lite Mode to Native Mode are:

1. Verus Bootstrap (downloadable from [Link 1: https://bootstrap.verus.io](https://bootstrap.verus.io))
2. Instructions to import Lite wallet address in Verus Desktop native (available at [Link 2: https://wiki.verus.io/#!how-to/how-to_convert-seed-to-wif.md](https://wiki.verus.io/#!how-to/how-to_convert-seed-to-wif.md))
3. A tool to check the signature (available at [Link 3: https://verus.io/verify-signatures](https://verus.io/verify-signatures))

# Guide to change Verus-Desktop from Lite Mode to Native Mode.Attention: Read completely before use.#### Important General Information### Verus `Wallet.dat`, Chaindata & `VRSC.conf` standard locations
 * Linux:		`~/.komodo/VRSC`
 * Mac OS: 	`~/Library/Application Support/Komodo/VRSC`
 * Windows 10: 	`%AppData%\Roaming\Komodo\VRSC\`
 * OS independent through Verus Desktop: Click `help`, `Show Verus data folder (default)`#### Necessary files & links:Link 1: [Download Verus Bootstrap](https://bootstrap.verus.io)
Link 2: [Import Lite wallet address in Verus Desktop native](https://wiki.verus.io/#!how-to/how-to_convert-seed-to-wif.md)
Link 3: [Checking the signature](https://verus.io/verify-signatures)
